remixlab.remixcam.constraint
Class LocalConstraint

java.lang.Object
  remixlab.remixcam.constraint.Constraint
      remixlab.remixcam.constraint.AxisPlaneConstraint
          remixlab.remixcam.constraint.LocalConstraint

public class LocalConstraint
extends AxisPlaneConstraint

An AxisPlaneConstraint defined in the Frame local coordinate system.

The AxisPlaneConstraint.translationConstraintDirection() and AxisPlaneConstraint.rotationConstraintDirection() are expressed in the Frame local coordinate system (see GLFrame.referenceFrame()).

Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class remixlab.remixcam.constraint.AxisPlaneConstraint

Method Summary
 Quaternion constrainRotation(Quaternion rotation, GLFrame frame)
          When AxisPlaneConstraint.rotationConstraintType() is of Type AXIS, constrain rotation to be a rotation around an axis whose direction is defined in the Frame local coordinate system by AxisPlaneConstraint.rotationConstraintDirection().
 Vector3D constrainTranslation(Vector3D translation, GLFrame frame)
          Depending on AxisPlaneConstraint.translationConstraintType(), constrain translation to be along an axis or limited to a plane defined in the Frame local coordinate system by AxisPlaneConstraint.translationConstraintDirection().

constrainTranslation

public Vector3D constrainTranslation(Vector3D translation,
                                     GLFrame frame)
Depending on AxisPlaneConstraint.translationConstraintType(), constrain translation to be along an axis or limited to a plane defined in the Frame local coordinate system by AxisPlaneConstraint.translationConstraintDirection().

constrainRotation

public Quaternion constrainRotation(Quaternion rotation,
                                    GLFrame frame)
When AxisPlaneConstraint.rotationConstraintType() is of Type AXIS, constrain rotation to be a rotation around an axis whose direction is defined in the Frame local coordinate system by AxisPlaneConstraint.rotationConstraintDirection().
